---

## Installation

```
pip install Check-Number
```

---

## Usage

```py
import check_number

print(check_number.is_number('+910000000000')
# => {"status": True}

print(check_number.is_number('Hello')
# => {"status": False}

print(check_number.is_numbers(
    ['+910000000000', '+10000000000']
)
# => {"status": True}
```
